root: ^You new in town? Would you like me to teach you how to barter in this city?

Tutorial: ^The goal of bartering is to bring your opponent's willingness all the way up!
^Do this during your negotiation by playing tone cards in response to your opponent's tone cards.
^The match result can either be postive increasing willingness, negative decreasing willingness, or neutral which does different things depending on the person.
^Figure out what each cards' positive match is and fill up the willingness meter! The matches will be different for every NPC so don't get too comfortable!

s: ^No, I need to hear it again.

Barter: ^First, choose an item to barter with. For me, anything will do! However others might want something specific.
BarterWin: ^You did it! Now, that wasn't so hard was it?
Challenge: ^I challenge you to get an item from everyone on this map!
^There are 3 normal people, 2 tough (experimental) ones, and me for 6 in total!
^I recommend seeking out the normal ones first. They're scattered throught the city, so explore! (Fyi, the experimental ones are in the square in front of you)
BarterLose: ^Aww, that's too bad. C'mon try again! You'll do better next time!
